meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 18, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Approval of the remaining two (2) resident Public Art Committee Nominations and Appointments for a term ending September 30, 2024

agenda_items.title: Recommendation in Support of Calcium Project as the lead artist for Watershed Floodgates Public Art Project located in Council District 7

agenda_items.title: Recommendation in support of the FY 2024-25 Cultural Organizations Program Guidelines
agenda_items.description: Recommendation for the guidelines of the Cultural Organizations Program.
